data.scheme_name: West Bengal Ethanol Production Promotion Policy 2021 - NYI
data.benefits: The scheme provides financial incentives such as land conversion fees, stamp duty, and electricity duty, as well as non-financial incentives such as water supply, electricity supply, and skill training.
data.eligibility: All new ethanol production facilities shall be eligible for the incentives under this policy.
data.conditions: Commercial production must start within one year of registering the unit under the policy.
data.beneficiaries: All new ethanol production facilities shall be eligible for the incentives under this policy.
data.prerequisites: Commercial production must start within one year of registering the unit under the policy.
data.context: The West Bengal Ethanol Production Promotion Policy, 2021, is a significant initiative by the Government of West Bengal aimed at promoting ethanol manufacturing within the state.
data.objective: The objective of the West Bengal Ethanol Production Promotion Policy 2021 are to stimulate the state's ethanol industry, promote the use of renewable energy, drive economic growth through investment and job creation, support sustainable development practices, and build a robust infrastructure for ethanol production.
data.description: The scheme provides financial incentives such as land conversion fees, stamp duty, and electricity duty, as well as non-financial incentives such as water supply, electricity supply, and skill training.
data.how_to_apply:
The applicant can apply through this link: https://silpasathi.wb.gov.in/user/login
All approvals needed for ethanol manufacturing units will be handled through the Single Window Clearance (SWC) portal called 'Silpa Sathi'.
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefit after the approval of the application by the West Bengal Induslrial Development Corporation (WBIDC).
data.additional_info: Land conversion fees include land mutation fees and land use conversion fees.
data.checklist_info_a:
Company Registration Documents
Project Report
Land Documents
Environmental Clearance
Financial Statements
Bank Statement/Financial Backing
Tax Compliance Documents
Technical Expertise
No Objection Certificate (NOC)
Proof of Technology
data.checklist_info_d:
Address : Protiti, 23, Abanindranath Tagore Sarani, (Camac Street), Kolkata - 700017, West Bengal, India.
Email     : silpa.sathi@wbidc.com
Phone   : 33 2255 3737
data.beneficiary: Specific Manufacturing Industries - All Entities - West Bengal - All MSMEs, All Non MSMEs
